Scaleheart skinwalkers receive a +2 racial bonus to Constitution, a -2 penalty to Wisdom, and a +2 racial bonus to Lore (Nature) and Stealth skills. When in their bestial form, they gain a +2 racial bonus to Strength, a primary bite attack that deals 1d6 damage, and the Ferocity feautre, allowing the scaleheart to fight on for one more round when reduced to 0 hit points. If the scaleheart is not brought above 0 hit points by the end of their next turn, they will fall unconscious.

zhCN: 鳞心兽态人在学识（自然）和隐匿技能检定上获得+2种族加值。
enGB: Scaleheart skinwalkers recieve a +2 racial bonus to Lore (Nature) and Stealth skill checks.

zhCN: 鳞心兽态人可以以标准动作改变自己的形态，在类人形态和兽化形态之间转换。当处于兽化形态时，鳞心兽态人的力量属性获得+2种族加值。在此形态下，鳞心兽态人还会获得一次造成1d6伤害的主要啮咬攻击，以及凶猛特性，使得鳞心兽态人在生命值降至0点时，能够继续战斗一轮。 如果鳞心兽态人在其下一个回合结束时仍未恢复到0点以上生命值，他们将陷入昏迷。
enGB: A scaleheart skinwalker can change shape to and from a bestial form as a standard action. In bestial form, a scaleheart skinwalker gains a +2 racial bonus to Strength. While in this form, a scaleheart skinwalker also gains a primary bite attack that deals 1d6 damage and the Ferocity feautre, allowing the scaleheart to fight on for one more round when reduced to 0 hit points. If the scaleheart is not brought above 0 hit points by the end of their next turn, they will fall unconscious.

zhCN:
地精是孩童般的生物、却有着破坏和贪吃的天性，这使得它们广泛地受到轻视。孱弱而怯懦，地精经常被需要步战炮灰的强大生物所驱使或奴役。那些在社会边缘自力更生的地精靠欺负更弱的文明生物混饭吃。多数其他种族将它们视为恶意寄生虫，这一点已被无数事实佐证。
地精几乎能吃任何东西，但最喜欢吃肉，尤其把人类和侏儒这些难搞到手的肉品作为佳肴。尽管害怕大个头的种族，地精的健忘和无底食欲意味着它们频繁地为了装满食品柜而向其他种族发动战争或劫掠。
enGB:
Goblins are a race of childlike creatures with a destructive and voracious nature that makes them almost universally despised. Weak and cowardly, goblins are frequently manipulated or enslaved by stronger creatures that need destructive, disposable foot soldiers. Those goblins that rely on their own wits to survive live on the fringes of society and feed on refuse and the weaker members of more civilized races. Most other races view them as virulent parasites that have proved impossible to exterminate. 
Goblins can eat nearly anything, but prefer a diet of meat and consider the flesh of humans and gnomes a rare and difficult-to-obtain delicacy. While they fear the bigger races, goblins?short memories and bottomless appetites mean they frequently go to war or execute raids against other races to sate their pernicious urges and fill their vast larders.

zhCN: 地精的基础移动速度获得10英尺加值。
enGB: Goblins gain a +10 foot bonus to their base speed.

zhCN: 虽然许多地精表现其族裔的典型表现，但更多地精并非如此。那些拥有不同血脉的地精可能会展现出截然不同的传承特征，无论是在外貌还是能力上。
enGB: Although many goblins follow the general model of the goblin, many more do not. Those of different lineages may evince dramatically different manifestations of their heritage, both in appearance and in ability.

zhCN: 地精在灵巧和隐匿技能检定上获得+2种族加值。
enGB: Goblins gain a +4 racial bonus on Mobility and Stealth checks.

zhCN: 生活在人类城市边界的地精靠着在垃圾中搜寻食物以及猎杀流浪动物为生。拥有该种族特性的地精在学识（自然）和知识（世界）技能检定上获得+2种族加值。
enGB: Goblins who live within the boundaries of human cities survive by scavenging for refuse and hunting stray animals. Goblins with this trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Perception, Lore (Nature), and Knowledge (World) skill checks.

zhCN: 由于打小就几乎没吃过什么像样的食物，大多数地精都见啥吃啥求生存，因此它们几乎能消化任何东西还不会生病。拥有该种族特性的地精在学识（自然）技能检定上获得获得+4种族加值，并且在对抗导致反胃和恶心的效果豁免检定上获得+4种族加值。
enGB: Raised with little or no proper food, many goblins have learned to survive by eating whatever they happen across and can digest nearly anything without getting sick. Goblins with this trait gain a +4 on Lore (Nature) and a +4 racial bonus on saves versus effects that cause the nauseated or sickened conditions.

zhCN: 地精靠着他们那球状大脑袋和大嘴为人所熟知，但是其中一部分有着大得夸张的脑袋和满嘴尖牙。拥有该种族特性的地精获得啮咬攻击作为主要天生武器，它可以造成1d4伤害。
enGB: Goblins are known for their balloon-like heads and enormous maws, but some have even more exaggeratedly large heads filled with razor-sharp teeth. Goblins with this trait gain a bite attack as a primary natural attack that deals 1d4 points of damage.

zhCN: 虽然地精的耳朵从来都不小，但是有些地精那出奇大的耳朵可以听取哪怕最细微的声音。拥有该种族特性的地精在察觉技能检定上获得+4加值。
enGB: While goblins' ears are never dainty, these goblins have freakishly large ears capable of picking up even the smallest sounds. Goblins with this racial trait gain a +4 bonus on Perception checks.

zhCN: 在荒蛮的雨林和沼泽中，很难找到坚硬的地面建造建筑。在这些地区生活的地精部族了解如何在树梢上生活。拥有该种族特性的地精在灵巧和运动技能检定上获得+4种族加值。
enGB: In trackless rain forests and marshes, it can be difficult to find dry ground to build on. goblin tribes living in such areas have learned to live in the treetops. These goblins gain a +4 racial bonus on Mobility and Athletics checks.

zhCN:
库鲁人是红眼睛的类人生物，脸上通常覆盖着令人不安的部落纹身。 他们参差不齐的牙齿似乎被锉成了尖状。 
虽然大多数库鲁人居住在废墟内部或周围的小型部落村庄中，但也有一些库鲁人选择放弃他们的邪教信仰，并在他们所来自的岛屿之外寻求冒险，尽管这种情况极为罕见。
enGB:
Kuru are red-eyed humanoids often with disturbing tribal tattoos covering their faces. Their jagged teeth appear to have been filed down to points. 
While most kuru live in small tribal villages in or around ruins, some choose to abandon their cultic faith and seek adventure beyond the islands from which they hail, though such individuals are extremely rare.

zhCN: 库鲁人拥有一种天生的啮咬攻击能力，可以造成1d6点伤害。
enGB: Kuru possess a natural bite attack that deals 1d6 points of damage.

zhCN: 库鲁人在对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定上获得+2种族加值。
enGB: A kuru gains a +2 racial bonus to saving throws against fear effects.

zhCN: 当库鲁人用啮咬攻击命中一个活物时，他可以通过摄取目标的血液获得1点临时生命值，持续一天。 此能力对构装体或不死生物无效。
enGB: When a kuru hits a living creature with its bite attack, he gains 1 temporary hit point for one day by ingesting the target's blood. This ability does not work on constructs or undead creatures.

zhCN: 蝮血裔是一种有毒血的异种类人生物。这些有着奇异美貌的生物透过她们金色而有纹理的眼睛观察世界。她们柔软的皮肤被通常有浅绿色的细小鳞片覆盖，这些鳞片有时会排成类似蛇类的纹理。她们无法被简单概括为是好人或坏人，不过既然她们能用那分叉的舌头讲真话，也就能把那种道德的问题留给别人，自己满足于金钱的回报上了。
enGB: Vishkanyas are a race of exotic humanoids with poisonous blood. Possessed of an alien beauty, these graceful humanoids see the world through serpentine eyes of burnished gold. Their supple skin is covered with tiny scales, often of a light green, which are sometimes arrayed in patterns not unlike those of a serpent. They cannot be generalized as good or evil, but since they truly speak with forked tongues, they are content to accept the gold they're offered and leave questions of morality to others.

zhCN: 蝮血裔在对抗毒素的豁免检定上获得等同于生命骰的种族加值。
enGB: A vishkanya has a racial bonus on saving throws against poison equal to its Hit Dice.

zhCN: 蝮血裔在灵巧和隐匿技能检定上获得+2加值。
enGB: Vishkanyas receive a +2 racial bonus on Mobility and Stealth checks.

zhCN: 蝮血裔总是擅长使用反曲刀和星刃。
enGB: Vishkanyas are always proficient with kukri and starknife.

zhCN:
每天等同于蝮血裔体质调整值次（最低每天1次），她能够使用自己带毒的唾液或血液，涂抹到正在持用的武器上（如果想要使用血液的话需要蝮血裔受到伤害）。如此用毒是一个迅捷动作。
蝮血毒 类型：毒素，伤口：豁免：强韧（DC 10+蝮血裔一半的生命骰+蝮血裔体质调整值）；频率：1次/轮，持续6轮；效果：1d2敏捷伤害；痊愈：豁免成功1次。
enGB:
A number of times per day equal to his Constitution modifier (minimum 1/day), a vishkanya can envenom a weapon that he wields with his toxic saliva. Applying venom in this way is a swift action. 
Vishkanya Venom: Injury; save Fort DC 10 + 1/2 the vishkanya's Hit Dice + the vishkanya's Constitution modifier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d2 Dex; cure 1 save.

zhCN:
对于那些拥有美好生活的人来说，死亡更加令人恐惧。 许多统治者沉迷于对自身终有一死的恐惧，其中最肆无忌惮的人会转向神秘的艺术，将他们的恐惧倾注于华丽的容器之中，塑造他们自身的模拟像，以代替他们承受神祇审判的鞭笞。 在凡人世界中，这些圣像不过是刻有统治者面容和名字的黄金，但在死亡之后，它们便成为了舍卜提。
舍卜提存在于凡人灵魂、 虚构的存在和真正的位面之子之间，是痴迷于死亡的贵族的永生化身。 它们代替其凡人服刑，无论是永恒的折磨还是在位面中无尽的游荡。 大多数舍卜提都无法从这样的试炼中脱身，但有些设法在各个位面中找到了属于自己的道路。
舍卜提通常看起来像是理想化的人类，拥有完美的身材和无瑕的容貌。 它们通常身高略高于6英尺，体重在150到210磅之间。
enGB:
Death is more terrifying for those who have the best of life. Many rulers obsess over their mortality, the most brazen turning to the mystical arts, pouring their fears into splendid vessels, fashioning simulacra of themselves to bear the scourge of their god's judgment. In the mortal world, these icons are nothing but gold with a ruler's face and name, but in death, they are shabti. 
Existing as something between mortal souls, fabricated beings, and true children of the planes, shabti are immortal facsimiles of death-obsessed nobles. They serve out the sentences of their mortal twins, whether it be an infinity of torture or an eternity wandering the planes. Most never emerge from such trials, but some manage to find their own paths upon the planes. 
Shabti typically look like idealized humans with perfect physiques and flawless features. They usually stand just over 6 feet tall and weigh between 150 and 210 pounds.

zhCN: 舍卜提不会自然衰老，也不会因年老而死亡。虽然有些舍卜提可能会在成年以外的年龄类别中诞生，但它们永远不会离开其最初的年龄类别。舍卜提不会被魔法老化，并且免疫任何导致衰老的能力或效果。
enGB: Shabti do not age naturally and cannot die of old age. While some might come into being at age categories other than adulthood, they never leave their original age category. Shabti cannot be magically aged and are immune to any ability or effect that causes aging.

zhCN: 舍卜提每天可以使用一次“严加斥责”作为类法术能力，施法者等级等同于该舍卜提的职业等级。
enGB: Shabti can use castigate once per day as a spell-like ability, with the caster level equal to the shabti's class level.

zhCN: 舍卜提免疫所有能量吸取效果，以及任何造成负向等级的效果或能力。
enGB: A shabti is immune to all energy drain effects as well as any effect or ability that inflicts negative levels.

zhCN: 舍卜提记得他们前世的片段。 因此，他们将所有知识和学识技能视为本职技能。
enGB: Shabti remember bits of their past lives. As a result, they treat all Knowledge and Lore skills as class skills.

zhCN:
狩狼人是狼头人身的类人生物，可以变身成狼。 虽然这有时会使其他人感到困惑，误以为狩狼人是狼人，但这些类人生物并非兽化人。 事实上，大多数狩狼人都厌恶狼人，并无情地猎杀他们。
狩狼人的数量不多，分布也不广泛，他们倾向于居住在与世隔绝的社群中。 他们非常保护自己的家人和朋友，他们形成的社群往往十分严谨且守序。 在他们的家园，狩狼人主要集中在南部沼泽和湿地，据信那里是他们的起源地，但此后他们已扩散到世界其他地方。
虽然大多数狩狼人社会都光明磊落且值得信赖，但与任何群体一样，其中也有一些暴力和侵略性成员。 这些邪恶的、独来独往的狩狼人偶尔会组成团伙，袭击乡村，掠夺善良和公正之人。 值得庆幸的是，狩狼人通常文明而忠诚，大多数狩狼人都很乐于追捕并惩罚他们那些因卑劣行径而堕落成野兽般的同族。
狩狼人的年龄增长方式与人类相似，但他们往往比普通人类略高且更重。
enGB:
Rougarous are wolf-headed humanoids who can transform into wolves. While this sometimes confuses others into mistaking a rougarou for a werewolf, these humanoids are not lycanthropes. In fact, most detest werewolves and hunt them mercilessly. 
The race isn抰 numerous or widespread, and rougarous tend to live in secluded communities. They are very protective of their families and friends, and the communities they form tend to be strict and lawful. In their homeland, rougarous are most plentiful in southern swamps and marshes, where it is believed they originated, but have since spread throughout the rest of the world. 
While most of rougarou society is upstanding and trustworthy, as with any group there are some violent and aggressive members. These evil, loner rougarous occasionally form into packs that raid the countryside and prey upon the just and kind. Thankfully, rougarous are generally civilized and loyal, and most are quick to hunt down and punish their feral kin for their foul deeds. 
Rougarous age like humans, but they tend to be slightly taller and heavier than typical humans.

zhCN: 狩狼人拥有一项啮咬攻击，可以造成1d4点伤害。 如果狩狼人挥舞着人造武器，则此项攻击为次要攻击。
enGB: Rougarous have a bite attack that deals 1d4 points of damage. This is a secondary attack if a rougarou wields a manufactured weapon.

zhCN:
狩狼人可以随意变为狼形态，这是一个标准动作，如同野兽之状I的法术效果。狩狼人可以以一个迅捷动作变回其真实形态。
野兽之状I:你变成了一头中型狼。你的{g|Encyclopedia:Strength}力量{/g}获得+2{g|Encyclopedia:Size}体型{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，获得+2天生{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御加值{/g}。你的{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}移动速度{/g}提高20英尺。你还拥有1次可造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点伤害的啮咬{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}，以及绊摔啮咬能力。
绊摔啮咬：如果狼用啮咬击中了敌人，就可以用{g|Encyclopedia:Free_Action}自由动作{/g}尝试绊摔敌人。
enGB:
A rougarou can change shape at will into a wolf as a standard action, as beast shape I. A rougarou can revert to its true form as a swift action. 
Beast Shape I: You become a medium wolf. You gain a +2 size bonus to your Strength and a +2 natural armor bonus. Your movement speed is increased by 20 feet. You also gain a 1d6 bite attack and the tripping bite ability. 
Tripping Bite: A wolf can attempt to trip its opponent as a free action if it hits with bite attack.

zhCN: 娜迦裔是一种蛇形有鳞的类人生物，它们的鳞片仿效着真正的娜迦那梦幻般的外表。与蛇类相同，她们有分叉的舌头、无眼睑的眼睛，因此她们的凝视使得绝大多数的其她种族感到不安。在其她方面，她们的身形更像人类，这也带来了关于她们出身的猜测。大部分人相信，真正的娜迦通过杂交、魔法或者两者并用创造了她们，并将她们作为仆役种族。而实际上娜迦裔也确实对娜迦奉若神明。娜迦裔经常给其他类人生物带来震慑与恐惧，既因为她们神秘的祖先也由于她们对剑与魔法的天赋。
enGB:
The nagaji are a race of ophidian humanoids with scaled skin that mimics the dramatic appearance of true nagas. Like serpents, they have forked tongues and lidless eyes, giving them an unblinking gaze that most other races find unnerving. Their physical forms are otherwise humanlike, raising wary speculation about their origins. It is widely believed that true nagas created them as a servitor race, through crossbreeding, magic, or both, and indeed nagaji revere nagas as living gods. Nagaji often inspire awe and fear among other humanoids, as much for their mysterious ancestry as for their talent for both swords and sorcery. 
Bred in the ancient past by nagas seeking a servitor race that combined the loyalty of a slave with the versatility of the human form, the nagaji have long since developed into a vibrant and proud race.

zhCN: 得益于她们带有鳞片的肌肤，娜迦裔获得+1天生防御加值。
enGB: Nagaji have a +1 natural armor bonus from their scaly flesh.

zhCN: 娜迦裔在对抗影响心灵的效果以及毒素时的豁免检定获得+2种族加值。
enGB: Nagaji receive a +2 racial saving throw bonus against mind-affecting effects and poison.

zhCN: 娜迦裔在学识（自然）技能检定上获得+2种族加值，在察觉技能检定上获得+4种族加值。
enGB: Nagaji receive a +2 racial bonus on Lore (Nature) checks, and a +4 racial bonus on Perception checks.

zhCN:
对于大多数人来说，混种人不过是个都市传说。他们被认为是那些参加了第一次圣战的士兵的后代，当时的圣教军对处理世界之伤的独特灾害还经验不足。如故事所言，在第一次圣战期间，许多人毫不知情地将自己暴露在堕落能量和噩梦般的辐射中。在随后的岁月里，圣教军中的新生儿中带有可怕畸形的数量令人震惊。这些不幸的无辜之人中，有许多人被过于狂热的审判官甚至是圣教军同袍处死，但有些父母逃到了地下，避开不容异己的光明世界，抚养他们的孩子。
无论这个故事是否属实，混种人都真实存在，他们居住在城市下方的巨大地下墓穴和洞窟中。虽然外表怪异，但混种人一般是勤劳友善的生物。世界上不会有两个长相相同的混种人，每个都通常具备至少六个不同生物的特征。这种奇怪结合造就了扭曲的外表，许多人因为恐惧而对他们避而远之，进而加重了混种人在社会中的边缘处境。面对大众的敌意，混种人倾向于离群索居。短得可怜的寿命限制了这种生物的人口增长——混种人很少能活过35岁。
enGB:
For most people, the mongrels are little more than an urban legend. They are believed to be the descendants of those who fought in the First Crusade, when the crusaders had little experience in dealing with the unique hazards the Worldwound presented. As the story goes, during the First Crusade, many unknowingly exposed themselves to fell energies and nightmarish radiations. In the years that followed, a shocking number of children born to the crusaders were hideously deformed. Many of these unfortunate innocents were put to death by overzealous inquisitors or even fellow crusaders, but some parents fled underground to raise their children outside of the light of intolerance. 
Whether or not this story is true, the mongrels are quite real, and inhabit the vast underground catacombs and caverns below the cities. Despite their monstrous appearances, mongrels are generally hardworking and peaceful creatures. No two mongrels look the same: each of them usually has characteristics from several different creatures. This strange mixture enforces mongrels' place away from society, for they are shunned by all who fear their twisted appearance. Mistaken as enemies by all, mongrels prefer to be left alone. A tragically short lifespan limits the creatures' population growth ?mongrels rarely live past 35 years.

zhCN: 没有两个混种人的外貌是相同的。 有些混种人可能长着半大地精半蜥蜴人的脸，一只脚像人类，另一只脚是偶蹄，而他的姐妹可能长着精灵的耳朵、矮人的胡须、兽人的獠牙和爪状的手。 每个混种人通常都具有来自许多不同生物的特征。 这种奇怪的混合使混种人被世界边缘化，因为所有人都因恐惧他们扭曲的外貌而躲避他们。
enGB: No two mongrels look the same. One may have a face that is half hobgoblin, half lizardfolk, with one human-like foot and one cloven hoof, while his sister may have elven ears, a dwarven beard, orc tusks, and clawed hands. Each mongrel usually has characteristics from many different creatures. This strange mixture enforces mongrels' place in the edges of the world, for they are shunned by all who fear their twisted appearance.

zhCN: 鹿种混种人外形类似大型健壮的森林有蹄类动物，他们每季都必须褪去鹿茸，以便为新犄角的生长腾出空间。
enGB: Resembling large, robust forest ungulates, stagseed mongrel must shed the velvet from their horns each season to make room for new growth.

zhCN: 岩肤混种人的皮肤表面覆盖着一层岩石矿物质，以至于经常被误认为是土巨灵裔的混血后代。
enGB: Encrusted with a dermal layer of rocky minerals, rockskin mongrels are often mistaken for the halfbreed children of oreads.

zhCN: 尽管名字如此，并且拥有鳞状皮肤，但冷血混种人是哺乳动物，如同他们种族的所有成员一样。
enGB: Despite the name and their scaly skin, coldblood mongrels are mammals, as are all members of their race.

zhCN: 浓密的腿部毛发和巨大的后掠角，使得森林裔混种人看起来像是神话传说中的第一世界生物。
enGB: Thick leg fur and large, swept-back horns make Forestkin mongrels resemble first-world creatures of myth.

zhCN: 牛育混种人拥有扭曲的犄角、发达的肌肉以及浓密的黑色毛发，在外形上类似公牛，尽管脾气秉性可能并非如此。
enGB: With twisted horns, dense muscle, and thick, black fur, these mongrels resemble bulls aesthetically, if not in temperment.

zhCN: 当外来者观察到猿裔混种人覆盖其身体和四肢大部分区域的浓密毛发时，常常会误以为他们是原始灵长类动物。
enGB: Monkeyborn mongrels are often mistaken for primitive primates when outsiders observe the thick fur that covers the majority of their bodies and limbs.

zhCN: 尽管蛛心混种人通常性格开朗友善，但由于他们具有掠夺性、异类的外貌，其他混种人往往会避开他们。
enGB: Despite often posessing jovial and kind personalities, other mongrels tend to avoid spiderheart mongrels due to their predatory, alien appearance.

zhCN: 猛禽之翼混种人那展开的纯白色羽翼赋予了他们仁慈而威严的气度，即使这些翅膀并不能让他们飞翔。
enGB: The expansive pure-white feathered wings of raptorwing mongrels give them a benevolent and imperious bearing even if they don't provide them with the ability to fly.

zhCN: 混种人拥有显著而细微的各种不同特征，但正是这些细微的差异，真正在视觉上将该种族的所有成员区分开来。
enGB: Mongrels possess divergent traits both dramatic and subtle, but it is the small differences that truly set all members of the race apart visually.

zhCN: 混种人获得+2天生防御加值。
enGB: Mongrels have a +2 natural armor bonus.

zhCN: 由于生活在社会边缘，受其他种族憎恨，混种人必须学会如何在不被察觉的情况下行动，并利用欺骗来维持生存。 混种人在隐匿和巧手技能检定上获得+4种族加值。
enGB: Living on the fringes of society, hated by other races, mongrels must learn how to move about without being detected and utilize deception to stay alive. Mongrels gain a +4 racial bonus to Stealth checks and Trickery checks.

zhCN:
与混血的神裔和魔裔不同，熵裔是凡间位面中多代暴露于混沌能量而产生的变异体。 
熵裔与幻蛇有许多共同特征。 他们柔韧灵活且具有韧性，抵抗衰变和熵的能量，并且可以感知将各个位面结合在一起的细微混沌流，这使他们能够警觉危险和欺骗，并允许有进取心的熵裔搅动这些漩涡并改写生物的命运。 他们也和幻蛇一样，对秩序充满好奇和蔑视，强制性地在世界各地游荡，以观察所能观察到的一切。
enGB:
Unlike the crossbreed aasimars and tieflings, ganzi are mutations caused by generations of exposure to chaotic energies in the Material Plane. 
Ganzi share many traits with proteans. They are fluid and flexible, resilient, resistant to the energies of decay and entropy, and can sense the delicate currents of chaos that bind the planes together, alerting them to danger and deception and allowing enterprising ganzi to stir those eddies and rewrite a creature's fortunes. They also share the proteans' curiosity and disdain for order, compulsively wandering the world to see what can be seen.

zhCN: 熵裔拥有5点强酸、电击和音波抗性，并且在对抗变形子学派法术时的豁免检定上获得+2种族加值
enGB: Ganzis have acid resistance 5, electricity resistance 5, and sonic resistance 5, and they gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against spells of the polymorph subschool.

zhCN: 熵裔在唬骗和学识（自然）技能检定上获得+4种族加值。
enGB: Ganzis gain a +2 racial bonus on Bluff and Lore (Nature) checks.

zhCN: 作为充满大漩涡熵之力量的生物，所有熵裔都有一种独特且不寻常的怪异，这以一种使得熵裔展现出与众不同的身体或者魔法能力。
enGB: As creatures infused with the entropic forces of the Maelstrom, all ganzis have a distinct and unusual oddity that manifests as a physical or magical ability that sets the ganzi apart.

zhCN: 血统特别受幻蛇这一存在影响的熵裔通常拥有五颜六色的羽毛、鳞片或皮肤，以及一条长长的蛇形尾巴。这条尾巴可以用来抓握物品。虽然拥有这一怪异的熵裔无法用尾巴持用武器，但是他们能够以一个迅捷动作运用他们的尾巴拿出药水并饮用。
enGB: Ganzis with lineages that are particularly influenced by the presence of proteans often have colorful feathers, scales, or skin, and a long serpentine tail. This tail can be used to carry items. While ganzis with this oddity cannot wield weapons with their tails, they can use their tails to retrieve potions and consume them as a swift action.

zhCN: 与混沌兽有着浓烈血统关联的熵裔保留了他们祖先对于变形的免疫力。除了在逃脱检定和对抗擒抱战技的CMD中获得+2加值以外，每当熵裔受到有害的变形效果（例如：变形或石化）的影响时，他们可以在下一轮开始时尝试一个新的豁免检定来终止此效果，他们在第二次豁免检定中获得+4加值。如果检定失败，变形效果会如同正常一样持续。
enGB: Ganzis with lineages that link strongly to chaos beasts retain some of their ancestors' immunity to transformation. In addition to gaining a +2 bonus on Mobility checks and to CMD against grapple combat maneuvers, when such ganzis are affected by a hostile transmutation effect (such as polymorphing or petrification), they can attempt a new saving throw at the start of their next turn to end the effect. They gain a +4 bonus on this second saving throw, but if they fail, the transmutation effect persists as long as it normally would.

zhCN: 与女武神有着血统联系的熵裔，他们的血脉在战斗技能方面体现了出来。这一类熵裔总是擅长使用所有的简易武器和军用武器，并且他们即使没有任何战士职业等级也可以获得通常仅供战士选取的专长（例如：武器专精）。
enGB: Ganzis with lineages that link to the valkyries manifest their heritage in their skill in combat. Such ganzis are always proficient with all simple and martial weapons, and they can qualify for feats normally available only to fighters (such as Weapon Specialization) even if they don抰 have any fighter class levels.

zhCN: 那些受到来自大漩涡（Maelstrom）或其居民以外的地区（译注：例如深渊、极乐原野、第一世界）的混乱影响的熵裔，其怪异通常表现为可以复制一个特定法术的效果。这一类熵裔获得一种类法术能力，每天一次，施法者等级等于熵裔的生命骰
enGB: Ganzis whose chaotic influences rise from regions other than the Maelstrom or its inhabitants often manifest an oddity that duplicates the effects of a specific spell. Such ganzis gain a spell-like ability, usable once per day at a caster level equal to the ganzi's HD.

zhCN: 血脉与混沌相连的熵裔，可能会继承异界生物的混沌思维的某种特性。熵裔脑海中翻腾的思维漩涡，增强了他们抵抗精神攻击的能力，使熵裔在对抗影响心灵的效果时，豁免检定获得+2加值。
enGB: A ganzi whose lineage is linked to hunduns might inherit an aspect of the outsiders' chaotic minds. The ganzi's churning vortex of thoughts bolsters it against mental attacks, granting the ganzi a +2 bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

zhCN: 大漩涡的影响力显现在熵裔随意变形自身肢体的能力上，他们可以将肢体转变成天生武器，例如巨大的爪状手臂。 熵裔获得一次造成1d6伤害的天生爪抓攻击。
enGB: The influence of the Maelstrom manifests in the ganzi's ability to transform one of her limbs at will, into a natural weapon such as a massive clawed arm. The ganzi gains a natural claw attack that deals 1d6 damage.

zhCN: 熵裔拥有一对细小的退化之翼，其外形可能但不限于类似于飞行生物或某种构装体的翅膀。 虽然这些附属肢体无法提供飞行能力，但当熵裔失去平衡时，他们可以使用翅膀来稳定自身。 这样的熵裔在反射豁免检定中获得+1加值，在灵巧技能检定中获得+2加值。
enGB: The ganzi has a pair of small, vestigial wings, likely but not limited to resembling those of a flying creature or some manner of construct. Though these appendages do not grant flight, these ganzis can use their wings to stabilize themselves when they're thrown off balance. Such ganzis gain a +1 bonus on Reflex saving throws and a +2 bonus on Mobility skill checks.

zhCN: 一些熵裔拥有令人不安的混沌灵光，这种灵光会惊扰靠近的敌对生物。 这样的熵裔每天可以以一个标准动作激活一次怪异灵光； 30尺范围内的敌人必须通过意志豁免检定（DC =10+熵裔生命骰数量的1/2+熵裔的魅力调整值），否则将陷入惊恐状态，直到熵裔的下一回合开始。 灵光持续的回合数等同于熵裔的魅力调整值（最少1回合）。 一旦某个生物受到怪异灵光的影响，无论其豁免检定成功与否，都无法在24小时内再次受到影响。
enGB: Some ganzis have an unsettling aura of chaos that rattles hostile creatures that venture too close. Once per day as a standard action, such a ganzi can activate an uncanny aura; enemies within 30 feet must succeed at a Will saving throw (DC = 10 + half the ganzi's Hit Dice + the ganzi's Charisma modifier) or become frightened until the beginning of the ganzi's next turn. The aura remains for a number of rounds equal to the ganzi's Charisma modifier (minimum 1 round). Once a creature has been affected by an uncanny aura, whether it failed its save or not, it cannot be affected again for 24 hours.

zhCN: 克服了邪恶本性的恶魔实属罕见，大多数人甚至都不相信会有这种情况。晋升的道路漫长而又艰辛：在真正皈依善道之前，恶魔要花费多年来灵修和忏悔，游移于善恶之间，每时每刻都冒着重堕罪恶深渊的风险。晋升恶魔将失去大多数恶魔能力，这有助于他们与重蹈覆辙的诱惑抗争，但也使他们在遭受痛恨对邪恶的背叛的其他恶魔报复时难以应对。
enGB: A demon who has overcome their evil nature is such a rare occurrence that most people don't even believe in their existence. The path of ascension is long and thorny: before truly achieving virtue, a demon spends many years in spiritual search and repentance, between good and evil, every moment risking to fall back into the depths of sin. An ascending demon loses most of their demonic powers, which helps them to battle the temptation to return to their old ways, but also leaves them vulnerable to retaliation from other demons, who loathe the idea of a rebellion against evil.

zhCN: 你拥有一对翅膀，赋予你飞行能力，你对抗近战攻击的防御等级获得+3闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形的效果。
enGB: You gain a pair of wings that grant a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks and immunity to ground-based effects, such as difficult terrain.

zhCN: 性情激烈并奉行军国主义，大地精以征服为生。掠夺为他们的战争机器提供原材料，他们的军备和建筑出自行苦役至死的奴隶之手。天性野心勃勃和善妒，大地精通过损害同类来谋取自身利益；但在战场上则与战友共同进退、严守军令，和最棒的士兵相比毫不逊色。大地精很少会爱护或信任同类，更不用提外族。他们粗野生命的意义在于追逐高位、支配下级、以及抓住稍纵即逝的良机来谋取个人的荣耀和地位。
enGB: Fierce and militaristic, hobgoblins survive by conquest. The raw materials to fuel their war machines come from raids, their armaments and buildings from the toil of slaves worked to death. Naturally ambitious and envious, hobgoblins seek to better themselves at the expense of others of their kind, yet in battle they put aside petty differences and fight with discipline rivaling that of the finest soldiers. Hobgoblins have little love or trust for one another, and even less for outsiders. Life for these brutes consists of duty to those of higher station, domination of those below, and the rare opportunities to seize personal glory and elevate their status.

zhCN: 大地精在隐匿检定上获得+4种族加值。
enGB: Hobgoblins receive a +4 racial bonus on Stealth checks.

zhCN: 大地精通常会研究控制他人的诀窍。 他们在交涉和威吓检定中获得+2种族加值。 此外，沟通始终是他们的本职技能。
enGB: Hobgoblins often develop a knack for controlling others. They gain a +2 racial bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate checks. Additionally, Persuasion is always a class skill for them.

zhCN: 不停地进行训练使得防御成为了某些大地精的第二天性。拥有该种族特性的大地精的CMD获得+1加值。
enGB: Incessant drills make defense second nature to some hobgoblins. Hobgoblins with this racial trait gain a +1 bonus to CMD.

zhCN: 有的大地精用狂妄的咆哮蔑视那些谨慎或狡诈的家伙。拥有该种族特性的大地精的威吓检定上获得+4种族加值。
enGB: Some hobgoblins scorn caution and subtlety for swagger and bluster. Hobgoblins with this racial trait gain a +4 racial bonus on Intimidate checks.

zhCN: 大地精对施法者又惧又恨。猎巫人在知识（奥秘）技能检定上获得+2种族加值，此外对奥术施法者的攻击检定获得+1种族加值。他们只能在对抗能够施放法术的生物时获得这些加值，而非那些只能使用类法术能力的生物。
enGB: Hobgoblins hate and fear arcane casters. A magehunter gains a +2 racial bonus on Knowledge (Arcana) checks and a +1 racial bonus on attack rolls against arcane spellcasters.

zhCN: 奴隶的血就是大地精战争机器的燃料。工头用随意挥舞的皮鞭从奄奄一息的劳动者身上榨取他们的价值。拥有该种族特性的大地精在使进行绊摔或者缴械战技检定上获得+1种族加值。
enGB: Slave blood fuels the hobgoblin war machine. Pit bosses extract the last breath of labor from their charges with a liberal touch of the lash and are experts at subduing unruly subordinates. Hobgoblins with this racial trait gain a +1 racial bonus on combat maneuver checks made to disarm or trip.

zhCN: 大地精奴隶贩子擅长追踪逃跑的奴隶以及在肮脏的环境下生存。拥有该种族特性的大地精的生存检定获得+2种族加值，此外在对抗疾病的强韧检定上获得+2种族加值。
enGB: Hobgoblin slavers excel at tracking down runaway slaves and surviving in filthy conditions. Hobgoblins with this racial trait gain a +2 racial bonus on Survival checks and a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against disease.

zhCN: 大地精社会中最低的阶层就是那些在军队中未能取得职位的人，他们很快就会明白巴结上司的价值。拥有该种族特性的大地精擅长一件军用武器，并且在唬骗以及交涉检定上获得+1种族加值。
enGB: Hobgoblins who failed to secure a position in the military hold the lowest status in hobgoblin society, and quickly learn the value of currying favor with their betters. Hobgoblins with this racial trait gain proficiency in a single martial weapon and +1 racial bonus on Bluff and Diplomacy checks.

zhCN: 虽然许多大地精表现其族裔的典型表现，但更多大地精并非如此。那些拥有不同背景的大地精可能会展现出截然不同的传承特征，无论是在外貌还是能力上。
enGB: Although many hobgoblins follow the general model of the hobgoblin, many more do not. Those of different backgrounds may evince dramatically different manifestations of their heritage, both in appearance and in ability.
